# Knowledge (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* | Balder, Frey, Freya, Heimdall, Njord, Odin, Sif, Thor |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Aureon |
| | *Golarion:* | [[Calistria]], Irori, Nethys, Norgorber, Pharasma |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Bahamut]], [[Corellon Larethian]], [[Ehlonna]], [[Garl Glittergold]], [[Heironeous]], [[Kord]], [[Moradin]], [[Pelor]], Yondalla |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* | Apollo, Artemis, [[Athena]], Hercules, Hermes, Hestia, The Academy, Zeus |
| | *Other:* | Elishar, Dennari, Taiia (creator aspect) |
| | *Pharaonic:* | Hathor, Isis, Nephthys, Osiris, Re-Horakhty |
| | *Toril:* | Angharradh, Azuth, [[Deep Sashelas]], Deneir, [[Dugmaren Brightmantle]], [[Dumathoin]], Gond, Gwaeron Windstrom, [[Labelas Enoreth]], Milil, Mystra, Oghma, Savras, Sehanine Moonbow, Shar, Siamorphe, Thoth, Tyr, Waukeen |

**Granted Powers**: You are a scholar and a sage of legends. In addition, you treat all [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] skills as class skills.

- *Lore Keeper (Sp)*: You can touch a creature to learn about its abilities and weaknesses. With a successful touch attack, you gain information as if you made the appropriate [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] skill check with a result equal to 15 + your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier.
- *Remote Viewing (Sp)*: Starting at 6th level, you can use *clairvoyance/clairaudience* at will as a spell-like ability using your cleric level as the caster level. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.

**Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Comprehend Languages (Spell)|Comprehend Languages]]****:** You understand all spoken and written languages.

**2** **[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|Detect Thoughts]]****:** Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

**3** **[[Speak with Dead (Spell)|Speak with Dead]]****:** Corpse answers one question/two levels.

**4** **[[Divination (Spell)|Divination]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Provides useful advice for specific proposed actions.

**5** **[[True Seeing (Spell)|True Seeing]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Lets you see all things as they really are.

**6** **[[Find the Path (Spell)|Find the Path]]****:** Shows most direct way to a location.

**7** **[[Legend Lore (Spell)|Legend Lore]]** **<sup>MF</sup>:** Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.

**8** **[[Discern Location (Spell)|Discern Location]]****:** Reveals exact location of creature or object.

**9** **[[Foresight (Spell)|Foresight]]****:** “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 44

                Deities and Demigods (WotC), pg. 214

                Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC), pg. 106

                Player's Guide to Faerun (WotC), pg. 88
